title: Aid reaches Sudan’s vulnerable as U.S., Saudi Arabia urge extension of cease-fire
description: The past week was relatively quiet, but the cease-fire is scheduled to end Monday, and renewed fighting could threaten the humaitarian aid trickling in.

title: Imran Khan increasingly isolated as Pakistan’s army pressures allies
description: Scores of aides and supporters have abandoned the powerful former prime minister since his arrest May 9 and a broader military crackdown.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Russia launches night raid on Kyiv with drones
description: At least one person was killed and another was hospitalized after attack drones swarmed the Ukrainian capital, Mayor Vitali Klitschko said.

title: In fields seeded with mines, Ukraine’s farmers face deadly planting season
description: Russians have retreated, but unexploded munitions remain.

title: Ukrainians fighting outside Bakhmut see Russian mercenaries withdrawing
description: Ukrainian soldiers say they see signs that Russia's Wagner mercenaries are pulling back and turning over defense of the recently captured city to regular Russian forces,

title: After bitter campaign, a divided Turkey votes in critical runoff election
description: Turkish voters head to the polls Sunday for a landmark presidential runoff, with President Recep Tayip Erdogan favored to cement his rule after 20 years in power.
